title: Board's clocktime is broken lol
body:
I'm posting from brazil and my topic's time is 5 hours ahead, probably it's reading the time value from my computer and not from the actual time i posted it lol 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/3HetHQtX-will-there-ever-be-a-godness-tear-mana-stackable-tank-item

i've just posted this and the forum says it was 5 hours ago

replies.body: Huh that's pretty weird, it's only showing up as being posted an hour ago for me as well. I think it's just going off your own pc time settings.
That's the point, the boards should'nt have that setting based off on user's clock settings, should it?
Do you happen to have a screenshot of what you're seeing on top? It's showing right to me, so I wanna help you pinpoint what's fudged up here.

http://prntscr.com/hlt2bz 
you replied the topic just a while ago but the boards shows me that it was five hours ago ahaha
I could be wrong, but I believe that's because your account is NA, so it's probably assuming your timezone based off of that.
